reviews.review: First time playing it, and damn, this game doesnt hold your hand. But must of been great for its time. Im enjoying it, and learning about old game designs. Weapon system and shooting mechanics, from the hip, pretty standard for its time. Lets see how far i go :D
Это игра сделала прорыв в игровой индустрии. Её должен пройти каждый!!

Por mais que eu queira gostar desse jogo, ele não envelheceu nem um pouco bem. Aqui estão os meus pontos:

-As fases são cheias de armadilhas que te matam instantâneamente, como inimigos spawnando na sua frente com lança-granadas e um helicóptero indestrutível até o game decidir que chegou a hora de você destruí-lo. Isso te força a fazer o temido "save scum".

-O combate é terrível. Qualquer inimigo que atira projéteis, includindo humanos, é extremamente chato de lidar porque não há como evitar dano. Inclusive, alguém teve a ideia brilhante de que inimigos que atiram "balas" que fazem curvas e te acertam atrás de paredes seria algo divertido; além de snipers ultra precisos e com intervalo curtíssimo entre seus tiros.

-Tem inúmeros jeitos de dar softlock não intencionalmente no jogo, predominantemente durante transições de fases. Isso aconteceu pelo menos dez vezes na minha segunda playthrough.

-O jogo não tem legendas, nem em inglês.

Na minha opinião, esse jogo atualmente é uma experiência extremamente frustrante e o seu tempo seria bem melhor gasto com algo diferente.

The game that even after 20 years!!! IS STILL ONE OF THE BEST out there! The story is really entertaining and of course when you finish it you should go play half life 2. When I was a kid I used to play the game a lot and it's even fun if you don't know English or if you don't listen to the npc. The game also has multiplayer with some very interesting battle mechanics.

Polecam! Gra przy której się dobrze bawiłem. Zakończenie nawet ciekawe tak jak i fabuła. To jest gra z klimatem którego nic nie przebije. Na razie nie chcę porównywać jedynki do dwójki ale szczerze mówiąc to jedynka jest naprawdę dobra i godna polecenia.

Klasyk każdy kto lubi FPS powinien zagrać w tą grę. To ona ustanowiła standard kiedy wyszła i dalej trzyma się dobrze. Szczególnie polecam osobom, które chcą zagrać w Black Mesa. Żeby móc docenić ten remake to trzeba zagrać w oryginał.
GOOD OLD CLASSIC. CAN'T BEAT IT!

1998 seems to have been a great year for gaming and Half - Life fits right in as a classic. This was my first time playing it and even after all these years it was amazing fun. It definitely has its issues, but considering the time period it came out in, that is expected.
I played it on the Hard difficulty and holy hell do I regret that. I died a billion times. The quick save button is your best friend; And just like any best friend you'll be abusing it to the fullest extent. A lot of it has to do with how absurd the difficulty spike is. A lot of the 'alien' enemies spawn sporadically, often times they'll spawn midway through a fight and pretty much one shot you when you least expect it. A lot of the game is spent hiding and getting a few hits in and then hiding again, which is reasonable. But all that breaks down when you have to face the military. Those guys will just chuck grenades at you like they just came out of a sale. Not to mention that they take a HUGE amount of bullets to kill, unless you use an OP weapon like the revolver or the [spoiler] Gluon Gun [/spoiler]. 
Coupled with all of that is the imprecise movement system which demands that you perform precise movements. Not fun.

The games has a few bugs, some of which are more than just a cause for concern. Once, was when a scientist wouldn't open a door, so the only solution was to reload the area. Not bad.
Another was when you have to drop missiles onto an area and I was using it to kill this one rather troublesome enemy (who can annihilate you in a second if you mess up); But, nothing happened when the missiles dropped, and it was only by luck that I'd done a quick save during the time when the missiles drop on the thing and after doing a quick load the bug guy just died. No clue why it didn't happen when I'd actually done it.

It might seem like I'm being critical, but this game kinda feels like Dark Souls I as far as my gameplay experience went. I hated it while playing it (partly due to the Hard difficulty), but I kept coming back to it whenever I got the chance. This is a very fun game; And, while I'd suggest not to play on the Hard difficulty, there definitely is a great sense of satisfaction in getting through each area when a game is that hard. 

It's free right now, and is well worth every hour that you'll put in it.
La trama es interesante y es un buen juego para su época, sin embargo la jugabilidad me llegó a resultar frustrante en algunas ocasiones.

Played this game when if first came out in the 1990's after my cousin recommended it.  I've been hooked ever since and continue to replay it often.  The story is amazing and I am still captivated by it today.  I've also played all the sequels and versions except for "Alex" (I'm only a casual gamer and won't purchase a VR rig)

just finished it recently for the first time had it downloaded but never played it, got encouraged to play, since the release of Half life: Alyx is coming soon, and this game is an instant classic that needs to be played by all gamers alike especially with the three other expansions (HL: Blue shift, opposing forces, and decay [ps2 exclusive sadly] ) that give different perspectives of the black mesa disaster. Even though this game is from 1998 its age doesn't show with gameplay, pretty advanced for its time to be honest especially if you look deeper into the lore 
would recommend 10/10
